fxInfo_clarification: These are ordinalized versions of the V-Dem divided party control index. The original index ranges from 0 to 1. These transformations offer three different ordinal versions with three_3C, four _4C, and five _5C levels respectively.
fxInfo_question: Are the executive and legislature controlled by different political parties?
name: e_v2x_lgdivparctrl_3C /_4C /_5C
